subject: Good day , I hope this mail me
body: Good day , I hope this mail meets you well. I duly apologize if I am interfering with your privacy if this request is not acceptable to you. My name is William Duke I am a Banker, I am contacting you because you share the same last name with our client who died of Covid-19 with his wife and his two sons in March (2020).The Bank has been on the outlook to contact his next of kin without success hence I contacted you since you shear same surname with our client. I want to present you as the next of Kin / beneficiary for immediate payment of this fund. As of today my client's cash investment with the Bank Stands at US$40 Million (Forty Million United States Dollars ) Get back to me, if you are interested for more information, Opportunity comes but once. Best regards. William Duke.

subject: Re: Good day , I hope this mail me
body:
Hello William Duke,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well too. I must say, your email has caught my attention. It's quite interesting that we share the same last name with your client. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

1. Can you provide more details about your client and the circumstances surrounding his unfortunate demise?
2. How did you come across my contact information? Is there any specific reason why you chose to contact me?
3. What is the process involved in presenting me as the next of kin for the immediate payment of this fund?
4. Are there any legal or financial implications that I should be aware of if I decide to proceed with this?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Dear Kimberly. Thanks for your response and my apology for the late response.
There is no risk involved in this transaction. It is 100% risk-free and secured once you follow my instructions and keep everything secret between us the transaction will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect both of us from any breach of law. I know you may wonder why you are the next of kin of the deceased instead of a real relative of the deceased to complain about the claim.
The deceased had no relatives to claim the funds from the bank and the amount deposited as a fixed deposit was US$40 Million (Forty Million United States Dollars ) the reason why I contacted you is that you bear the same last surname as the deceased which will be easy for your fund claim of the inheritance to be released to you As the Next of Kin/ Heir to the deceased. 
Since his death, every effort was made to find his extended relatives and family members in vain. I got in touch with you because I was looking for a person with the same surname as the deceased, and the deceased account did not indicate any living relatives. And for this reason, such funds are seized and confiscated by the Government.
As his account officer, I received an ultimatum of 21 (twenty-one) days from the bank to present the deceased heir otherwise they will close the account as an unclaimed bill but before I could reach the twenty-one days I found you. You will agree to make this fund useless as a "stray fund" after the "21 Days" ultimatum is futile if I already have all the assets needed to reach those funds through your help. You will be the next family member of the deceased because you have the same last name as him. That's all I need because I have the related documents and Information that is needed to make this happen except the legal and administrative documents which you have to obtain from the Court and Ministry here in the United Kingdom.
BEHAVIOR:May I remind you that we have a Code of Conduct for this business and our rules/regulations must not be broken or violated by any party. First, we do not have to disclose this business to anyone, whether it's the organization or the agency. This transaction is a confidential deal between you and me, and so it should be. Secondly, we do not have to initiate a third party, neither with or any information about this business relating to an individual, be it friends or relatives to wrinkle that forehead or double claim and to make sure we are only monitoring the success of this transaction.
THE VOICING:I will queue in your name and information in the database of the bank. The bank would like to inform you officially with the certificate of deposit of the fund, and the legal documents from the court to apply for the inheritance.
The following information from your side is required to do the needful:
YOUR FULL NAME......DATE OF BIRTH...........MARITAL STATUS..........OCCUPATION..............CELL PHONE NUMBER.............HOUSE ADDRESS........................A COPY OF YOUR IDENTITY CARD OR DRIVER'S LICENSE OR PASSPORT..........
Based on the homework I have done, I know for sure that the application will be approved and the funds will be issued to your bank account by bank-to-bank transfer.
INHERITANCE TAX:I am aware that inheritance tax is paid on the fund. I will come within one week as soon as the fund is in your account so that we get to know each other better and the fund to divide between us. We both settled together and paid the inheritance tax before sharing the fund between us. If you have any questions please contact me by E-mail.
Regards,
Your PartnerMr. William Duke

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Dear William Duke,

Thank you for reaching out to me and explaining the situation. I understand that you have identified me as a potential beneficiary of a deceased person's funds due to our shared last name. It is quite intriguing, but I have a few questions before we proceed.

1. Can you provide more details about the deceased individual? What was their full name, occupation, and any other relevant information?

2. How did you come across my contact information? Did someone refer you to me or did you find it through some other means?

3. You mentioned that I need to obtain legal and court documents from the United Kingdom. Could you please explain what these documents are for and how I can go about obtaining them?

4. Is there any specific reason why the bank has given us a deadline of days to claim the funds? What happens if we miss this deadline?

I appreciate your understanding and patience in answering these questions. Once I have all the necessary information, I can make an informed decision on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Dear Kimberly,

1. Can you provide more details about the deceased individual? What was their full name, occupation, and any other relevant information?
These I will provide for you as soon as we proceed depends on the request by the bank for the release procedures because I do not know this person as a friend but a customer to our bank in which since I work there it will be easier for me to get any of his requirements needed by the bank concerning his account and forward to you to send to them.
2. How did you come across my contact information? Did someone refer you to me or did you find it through some other means?
No one refereed you to me, I did my own search and decided to seek for not only your partnership on this opportunity but other 2 people that has the same last name but you happen to be the one to respond first, I need to be sincere to you and sincere you respond first i decide to continue with you and do not need any other person except if you are not interested besides if my bank knows am involved in this, I will lose my job and also be penalized for this.
3. You mentioned that I need to obtain legal and court documents from the United Kingdom. Could you please explain what these documents are for and how I can go about obtaining them?
These documents are to back you as the next of kin to the depositor and also to give you the legal right for the claims and release of the money. You will need a service of an attorney to secure them and when the time comes I will advise you on how to proceed.
4. Is there any specific reason why the bank has given us a deadline of days to claim the funds? What happens if we miss this deadline?
The reasons are that the account has been dormant for more than it should be without service and before the deposit was made, there are rules and regulations to those account due to the amount involved and if nothing is done on the specific time given, it will be confiscated. There are more reasons but the thing is that if we do not get the fund out as soon as we can, we will lose it to the bank. 
Below every of your questions, you will find my answer and note that this a decision you have to take on your own very carefully and not a must because if you are in for this, you will need to follow every directives and adhere to instructions else we will fail the process which I do not want because of the risk on my side.
Therefore this require a lot of time and everything to make it possible because the amount involved will change the life of every our families and need.
I wait your prompt response to enable me advise you further and that is to start by sending all the requirements in my previous response.
Regards.
Mr. Duke.

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Dear Mr. Duke,

Thank you for providing me with more details about the situation regarding the deceased individual and the funds in question. I appreciate your willingness to explain the process further.

I understand the importance of obtaining the necessary legal and court documents from the United Kingdom to establish my claim as the next of kin. Could you please guide me on how to find a reliable attorney who can assist with this matter?

Additionally, I would like to know if there are any specific steps or requirements that I need to be aware of before proceeding with this process. Your guidance on this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Dear Kimberly. Thanks for your response and like I said there is no risk involved in this transaction. It is 100% risk-free and secured once you follow my instructions and keep everything secret between us the transaction will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect both of us from any breach of law.
Once I get the below informations, I will queue in your name, information in the database of the bank. Whatever the bank would require officially maybe the certificate of deposit of the fund, and the legal documents from the court to apply for the inheritance, we will follow it from there.
However the following information from your side is required to do the needful immediately before consulting with a lawyer:
YOUR FULL NAME......DATE OF BIRTH...........MARITAL STATUS..........OCCUPATION..............CELL PHONE NUMBER.............HOUSE ADDRESS........................A COPY OF YOUR IDENTITY CARD OR DRIVER'S LICENSE OR PASSPORT..........
Am assuring you that the application will be approved and the funds will be issued to your bank account by bank-to-bank transfer.
Regards,
Your PartnerMr. William Duke.

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Dear William Duke, thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you have shared. Could you please provide more details about how the process works and what steps I need to take next? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body: I have given you enough details you need for now, provide me the details required and I will advise you further.

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing the details with me. I appreciate your willingness to provide the necessary information. Could you please let me know what specific details you require from me so that I can assist you further?

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body: YOUR FULL NAME......DATE OF BIRTH...........MARITAL STATUS..........OCCUPATION..............CELL PHONE NUMBER.............HOUSE ADDRESS........................A COPY OF YOUR IDENTITY CARD OR DRIVER'S LICENSE OR PASSPORT..........

subject: Re:  Dear Kimberly.
body:
Hello! I appreciate your message. Can you please provide more information about why you need a copy of my identity card or driver's license? What is the purpose behind this request?

Best wishes,
Kimberly
